data.meta_site_name: Lester Marsh Obituary | December 11, 2020 | Ellinger-Kunz & Park Funeral Home & Cremation Service - Rochester, IL
data.text:
Lester L Marsh

Lester (LeRoy) Marsh, 79 of Riverton IL. passed away Friday December 11, 2020. He was born on December 4, 1941 in Riverton Illinois, the son of Lester and Dorothy Marsh. On May 11, 1962 he Married Gloria Graves. He is survived by his wife Gloria, his sons Martin (wife Lori) and Aaron Marsh.

His grandchildren; Martin Jr (wife Kenia), Alexis Tank (husband Quin), Macy, Kolby.

LeRoy dedicated his life to serving Jehovah and was baptized on October 2,1952 and remained faithful until his death. He was always encouraging and helpful because of his love for people. His words of counsel and advice helped us as he always had a way of putting things into perspective. Some of his favorite things included hosting gatherings, cooking burgoo, playing guitar and singing along with his family and friends. He will truly be missed by our family and so many others that have known him.

Our family is hosting a private, virtual memorial service.

Memorial talk to be given by Robert Woosley

If you would like to be included, you may contact Marty at 217-638-1914

To send flowers to the family or plant a tree in memory of Lester LeRoy Marsh, please visit our floral store.
